animeTitle: Umi Monogatari: Kanon to Iku Amamikoshima
animeDescription: DVD specials of Umi Monogatari. Kanon (and sometimes other characters) tours the viewer around Amamiko Island, while also commenting about characters and events from the series.
animeRelated: ['Other: Umi Monogatari: Anata ga Ite Kureta Koto']
